name: Assault on Ceres
description:
Switch between guns for offense and shields for defense. Gamepad recommended. The HTML5 version plays well, but doesn't look quite as good as the downloadable version.

Made for the Indies Vs Gamers game Jam.

If you want to get on an online score board, you can play on Game Jolt or sign into a Game Jolt account from the downloadable version. http://gamejolt.com/games/assault-on-ceres/80512
